column2:
"...WHAT THE-!? Oh... <%me>.
D-don't scare me like that..."
"Quick, hide! See the professor over there?"
"Judging by the equipment, she's heading out on another research expedition. But she's ill-prepared as always..."
"What'd you say? I should speak up!? N-no way. I... I can't face her right now..."
"Oh? I thought that voice sounded familiar. It's you, isn't it, Light?"
"It's about time you came out of hiding. Come, there's much work to be done. It's been problematic doing this single-handed."
"...Light, this isn't the time to be babbling to yourself."
"Are you my assistant or not? Let's get going."
"Professor, what is this? You bought yet another piece of junk with the research funds, didn't you!?"
"How dare you call it junk. A good researcher should always procure what he or she deems necessary for the task, without hesitation!"
"Ah-ah-ah...! Look at this mess! And this many!?"
"Oh, hush. Is that not your assignment, to organize? Your absence is quite an inconvenience."
"...Okay, okay!! But now that I'm back, this has got to stop!"
"As a researcher, I cannot make any promises."
